title: Fixed Swapped Links
author: ZachLondono
details: Fixed swapped anchor links in documentation for connecting repositories to packages.
Corrected links for organization-scoped and user-scoped package connections.
Ensured proper navigation to "Connecting a repository to an organization-scoped package" and "Connecting a repository to a user-scoped package" sections.
summary:

- Ensured proper navigation to "Connecting a repository to an organization-scoped package" and "Connecting a repository to a user-scoped package" sections.
